Text: Trump, Putin, and Xi have been working together to create a monoempire. Today's brazen move towards dictatorship in the United States is just one-third of a global power grab which includes Chinese and Russian empire building through the invasion of their neighbours.

Joe Biden begins his remarks: " 'I can't breathe. I can't breathe.' George Floyd's last words. But they didn't die with him. They're still being heard. Echoing across this nation....'I can't breathe.' It's a wake-up call for our nation. For all of us."
